<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instant Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=3581) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092)

</column>

---

A knight is nothing without their armor, and you know how to keep yours ready. You can perform a 10-minute ritual, which has the [conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33) and [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) traits, to divert a set of heavy armor you are wearing into an extradimensional space connected to you. While the armor is in this space, you can use a three-action activity, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), conjuration, and teleportation traits, to phase the armor back and instantly don it. The armor automatically phases away if you don another set of armor, if you become [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), or if you die. If you are incapable of wearing the armor when it phases back, it appears in your square instead.
name: Instant Armor
